name: Nick Reckless in The Curse of the Lost Cause
storyline:
A treasure long lost brought a curse on his family,
His destiny is no longer in his control,
But can this journey turn the tide?

Travel across different worlds,
Find your way through hazardous challenges,
Overthrow all the pitfalls that stand between you and your fate,
And bring back what has been stolen in hope to lift
The curse of the lost cause.
summary: Enjoy the mystery of old school gameplay in this classic side-scrolling platformer, explore four different environments, make your way through procedurally generated levels for ever-changing play sessions, and ultimately lift the curse of the lost cause.
